item.title: [javascript] "Math.round()" or "Number.prototype.toFixed()"
item.description:
Intro. When I rounded a negative number by "Math.round()" or "Number.prototype.toFixed()", I noticed a little difference. "Math.round()" converted -12.5 into -12.0 and -12.6 into -13.0 .
-12.5 -> -12.0 -12.6 -> -13.0
"toFixed()" converted -12.4 into -12.0 and -12.5 into -13.0 .
-12.4 -...
